ElementGetAttribute.summary:
The getAttribute() method of the
interface returns the value of a specified attribute on the
element.

remarks.para:
If the given attribute does not exist, the value returned will
either be null or "" (the empty string); see Non-existing attributes for details.
If you need to inspect the node's properties, you can use the method instead.

ElementGetAttribute.returns: A string containing the value of attributeName.
